paltry.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a paltry amount of something is too small to be useful or important
paltry.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He received only a paltry Â£25 a day.
paltry.translation[1].definitions[0].def: very small in number or amount and therefore not useful, important, or valuable
paltry.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: As interest rates fell, returns on fixed-income investments looked paltry compared with the stock market gains.
